website_summaries.verdict: These straight-barrel locks provide security and flexibility.
pros: Locks work with a key, eliminating problems with setting combinations
Wire detaches, making it easier to use in some situations, particularly on smaller bags and purses
Works when other locks won't fit
Can be easier to use than padlocks
cons: All of the locks are keyed the same, making them easy to access for someone else with the same type of lock

customer_reviews.title: All Locks keyed a alike. Not just in the ones in the set !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of 4 locks at 2 different occasions. According to the products details 4 locks in the set are keyed alike but the second set of 4 locks is also keyed exactly same as the first set. This is not what I expected. I was expecting the 4 locks in 1st set to be keyed alike and 4 locks in the second set to be keyed alike but Keys for set 1 and 2 would be different but all 8 have the same keys!!! Makes me wonder how many same keys and locks they have distributed to others. All my 8 locks have code as 702 even though 4 orange ones were ordered later.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: A very simple and useful device that I use to prevent cheeseburger theft from ...
customer_reviews.text: A very simple and useful device that I use to prevent cheeseburger theft from a clearly marked lunchbag kept in a work fridge. I don't know what I'd do without it... other than going hungry due to a thieving cheeseburger thief. I had a cheeseburger stole once. I bought this device. It works.
customer_reviews.author: D. EllisTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Very very insecure lock. Picked in 2 seconds.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling to Vegas for DefCon. Decided to test it's anti-picking abilities. It has none. Picked in 2 seconds. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great little locks!
customer_reviews.text: Saw these when offered on "Today's Deals" a while back and bought a set because... well, why not? Seemed liked they might come in handy for something besides just luggage. And they do. My electrician son spied them on my desk and asked if he could use them for his tools' tote bags. He's been very pleased with both the design and size of these locks. He's been using them for several weeks now (preventing his tools from being "borrowed" by "sticky fingers") and they've held up well under frequent daily use. He's usually a hard customer to please so, since these have his seal of approval, I plan to order another set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: HorseHugger

customer_reviews.title: Loved it...but TSA must have been confused by it
customer_reviews.text: I really loved the simplicity of this lock. However, the TSA agent who inspected my bag on my way home must not have known how to lock it back up because it wasn't on my bag when I picked it up. I think I'll stick to a traditional looking lock so as not to confuse TSA agents.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: NOT ALL KEYED ALIKE
customer_reviews.text: It says in the description that all the locks are keyed alike and that any key will work with all the locks. This was the ONLY reason I chose this product and it's NOT TRUE. Each lock in the four pack comes with two keys and they don't work on any lock except the one it's packaged with.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Robles

customer_reviews.title: Great for locking my bike bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this to lock my bike bags when I leave them on my bike in low crime areas. The flexible cord goes easily through the zipper pulls of my small frame bag and also my back trunk. I thread them with a cable attached to the bike frame in between (this for the small pack  and this  for the back trunk). I found the locks to be easy to use and they are enough to deter casual theft without adding a lot of extra weight or bulk. The multiple locks with a common key is convenient also.
customer_reviews.author: pixelslave

customer_reviews.title: Just read the review
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I'm only reviewing these so other people know... they are not easy to use, as in one hand or quick (I fly alone with three kids) but easy to use because you just push and lock. They are about three inches total - great for all luggage, bags, gun cases or things that have odd spaces to lock. The set I bought had four sets, all matching keys (maybe good for you) wasn't a great security feature in general, in my opinion. Great locks, just want you to know what you're in for. :)
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn

customer_reviews.title: While this may seem unnecessary, it helps prevent you from getting locked out ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid locks; the internal mechanism works smoothly. The keys are also slightly larger than your typical TSA approved padlock keys, so it's easier to keep track of them. It's worth mentioning that the key must be engaged in order for the two pieces of the lock to lock together. While this may seem unnecessary, it helps prevent you from getting locked out of your own luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy TSA-friendly locks for more than to spot your luggage from a distance.
customer_reviews.text: No, really. It's not hard to have and carry a set of those keys through TSA and unlock any bags you see with that silly little logo. Especially since Homeland Security made it easy to copy them from pictures and recreate either by hand or by 3D printer. However, these locks make it easier to identify your bag. Almost nobody uses bright orange luggage. It'll also keep out people that don't know how to pick locks, and don't have a saw or metal-cutting tool readily available. As for security, a set of tools, be it a key rake or a cheap saw, will bypass this type of lock in 15 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Dubois

customer_reviews.title: amazing design, poor security
customer_reviews.text: * i really wanted to like this * the design is attractive * it's super comfortable and convenient to work with * and the compact size is great * but the security is lacking * i can cut this lock without too much difficulty * yes, i know that i'm muscular * but i'm only 69 kg * the world is full of guys that are twice my size and much stronger * and so, the wire, or whatever future material they choose, should be at least thrice as tough * 'if this product is upgraded with greater resistance * 'then i'll update this review to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy for A Lite Travel
customer_reviews.text: I am traveling Europe for a month and these will come in handy considering we planed to not check any bags. These are small relatively inexpensive and will help secure the main compartment on our travel gear. Color is nice and easy to spot, re-lock was a little challenging at first but once you play around with it you get a good feel for the lock. This won't protect from career thieves they will just cut your bag but this should deter the opportunist hotel maid or kleptomaniac. Pair with a pack with a wire anti-theft lining if you really want to secure your belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Dean G.

customer_reviews.title: Works for travel
customer_reviews.text: I like these locks very much. First thing first these will not keep people out of your bags if they want in. No travel lock will. Having said that they are very high quality from a build perspective. I like the color as it stands out. One gripe is that the key has to stay fully turned to relock the lock, whick is great, except you have to keep tension on it to keep it turned. It takes some getting used to. On the positive side the TSA agent was easily able to unlock these locks with hisaster key.
customer_reviews.author: Mshelton

customer_reviews.title: Not great, more like okay.
customer_reviews.text: I like how heavy and solid these locks feel. I'm not under any delusion that they could hold up against a real attack by a thief. I'm using for camera gear to give some sense of security when tethering these locks to a steel cord and attaching to my car's truck. It also keeps my nephews from trying to open the case :) My biggest issue is that (as other reviewers mentioned) the keys get caught in the lock and takes some wiggling to get it out. I feel like if you design a lock, make sure the key can be inserted smoothly and be removed smoothly too.
customer_reviews.author: John Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: and the orange color and unusual design made our luggage easy to differentiate
customer_reviews.text: These performed admirably on our trip, and the orange color and unusual design made our luggage easy to differentiate, but the fact that these each come apart into 2 separate pieces and that the key can be removed while the lock is unlocked makes these a little less than ideal for usability. You definitely need two hands to use these, and you have to be careful not to lose the little flexible stick of coated steel cable. These do feel very secure, though. The lock mechanism is very heavy and solid.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Cool new style...
customer_reviews.text: These fit in all zippers that I have on hand that don't have the lock holes already on them. I will be using these on an upcoming trip and am happy that they have the same keys for all just in case one of my kids loses theirs. I got the orange so hopefully the bright color makes my luggage stand out from either accidentally being picked up by someone else or maybe just easier for me to spot. Will update if anything unusual happens.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel lock!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 4 pack a few days before leaving to our Disney trip. They arrived in a complete set of 4 with 4 keys. They are light weight but very sturdy. All my 4 keys worked with no problem. Since it is a set, all keys work for all locks. This was beneficial to me as I could have several back ups on the trip in case we lost one key. There was no problem while traveling with the air lines and I since have used them for several more trips. I would recommend them for traveling. Small but strong little locks.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora M

customer_reviews.title: Unique padlocks
customer_reviews.text: The unique look stands out from the many luggages in the conveyor. It's so easy to use. The pack uses the same key. You don't need to bring all keys. Keep the rest as spare. Keep in mind this is just a theft deterrent and not meant to secure your luggage. All TSA locks are the same and can be opened by a TSA master key.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: The Work As Advertised Online, TSA Approved Locks.
customer_reviews.text: The security end that goes inside the round lock barrel seems to require a little extra effort inserting it into the barrel and getting it to lock, the getting the key removed from the lock barrel is easier than at first. Everything works well and the lock keys are interchangeable for the locks , for the lock barrels. A great price. I luv mine and will use the often. Buy at least 3-4. TSA approved travel locks
customer_reviews.author: Paris Dwight Willis

customer_reviews.title: Bought it as the only option
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5 starts because for luggage this thing will definitely work and if you need a convenient, light weigh and secure lock - this is it. I bough it as the only option for my bike rack. It works fine though and I have no fear that somebody will steal my rack while I am away riding by bike.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for a long trip. The locks was easy to use, the key didn't have any issue, and the way to lock/unlock the bags is perfect, also it's original the way the lock looks like. I'm totally happy with this product, and if I have a chance I will buy it in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: The boy in the bag

customer_reviews.title: SELLER a great purchase annot go wrong. Keep things locked these so easy use of locks ty to seller
customer_reviews.text: Seem as SHOWN. Would see no reason they are anything bug simple usage . Arrived timely and looks are very impressive. Went with the orange yo stand out looking for luggage . Coukdnt be HAPPIER. The price was great & hope to purchase more from SELLER in future. I suggest anyone yo give them a go. Kn oi w what goingv tu l try fast. Ok we this a real treat lm very i.pressed suggesting co displays and delivers as seen & described ty
customer_reviews.author: Hello

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage lock
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of luggage locks are to keep airport employees from snooping. And to keep your bags from opening after being dropped thrown and run over at the airport. These are TSA approved so they can open for inspection. These are not security locks. These can be easily picked. And reading other reviews. Seems They ALL use the same key.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: All locks are keyed the same but worked for my use
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for when I deploy to secure my backpacks. They work great but just like the other comments all the locks are keyed the same. I guess this ok with me since i have locks on everything I own I’d rather deal with one key for four locks. Locking them was a little tricky Since they don’t click to lock. Although all locks are keyed the same they work for my use and easy to keep track of the key in a chaotic situation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the solid and sturdy look although it has only a small footprint.
customer_reviews.text: I like the solid and sturdy feel of the lock. Also love the small footprint that ensures the locks don't get stuck on the conveyer belt, unlike the usual type that I had been using. Each pc came with 2 pcs of keys which can be used on all the locks. That makes it a total of 8 keys interchangeable on all the 4 locks. Can't remove the key in the unlocked mode and I find this feature very useful as it ensures we insert the wired part back into the cylinder body and thus minimize the risk of losing the wired part. Will be travelling soon and hoping to get a good experience with it.
customer_reviews.author: Narendra D. Daswani

customer_reviews.title: convenient 4-lock set
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of these better than standard padlock style locks. Having all 4 keyed the same is nice for when you check multiple bags or are traveling with someone else with bags, as you can either carry fewer keys, or both people can carry copy of same key for backup in case one gets lost or broken.
customer_reviews.author: daveNYC

customer_reviews.title: A different kind of lock that works
customer_reviews.text: Let’s be honest, if a thief wants to break into something then they are going to. This lock is meant as a deterrent and to slow them down. Will a thief chose a bag with no lock over one with a lock, for the most part yes because it’s easier and quicker. I say buy it for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Handy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Yes they work pretty good! Keep in mind that works with most luggages or any with small holes for this type of locks, my friend had a different type and it didn't work for hers but over all I did like it and very easy to use, tsa opened my luggage and no problems with the lock, worth mention, the key for these locks is universal!
customer_reviews.author: MONTYHADES

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage lock, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This didnt work for what I needed (a lockable storage bin), but it is still a really cool little lock. I plan to keep it and use it for my luggage next time I take a trip. It is well made, comes with 2 keys and opens and closes easily. I really like the design!
customer_reviews.author: user927

customer_reviews.title: Great locks for the zippers on luggage.
customer_reviews.text: These flexible locks work great for zippers on luggage or any bag with twin zippers. They easily fit the holes and or gaps of the zippers and are very easy to put on and take off. The cable would probably be easier to cut than solid steel, but for the side pockets of luggage, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Not what we though
customer_reviews.text: The concept is good but we couldn't use it on our backpacks. It went through the slot just fine but we couldn't get it to latch. It was complicated as you had to hold the device and turn key at the same time to lock. Wasn't functional for us so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: They are sometimes hard to get on and off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that I have bought before and I just bought another set due to the fact that I lost my older ones. Out of all the TSA approved ones I have tried, I have like these the best even though they are sometimes a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: F.M.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: it works fine. One things to note you can use the same key if you order more than one locks. I was expected the lock to have independent keys despite of how many locks you bought. I am not disqualify how great they are but it is something to keep in mind for someone who want to buy it
customer_reviews.author: J.junior

customer_reviews.title: Nice product just not for backpacks
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure it would be good on luggage but on backpacks you got to have the metal zipper not the rope steps right through broke on one end you have to tie it around and make it work but nice lots should be very nice for my gun bag
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT ERICKSON

customer_reviews.title: No problems with international flights
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great. I had no issues with my flight to England. Locks and unlocks with ease. It isn't too tiny or overly bulky. Its a relief to finally be able to lock my luggage that isn't a problem with TSA. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: artisangirl

customer_reviews.title: Decent but careful using with your suitcase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Worked great. Only complaint is they tend to get stuck going through the baggage claim. One of mine got ripped off my suitcase while traveling and broke the zipper, so that sucked, but overall they do what they supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TSA approved blocks
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these TSA approved locks, and orange. They came in they are all keyed the same. The king of the same makes a simple and easy to carry the key you need for travel. I highly recommend them at this time
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Design and color
customer_reviews.text: I got these locks for two reasons one because of the color will stand out against my black luggage and two the unique design of the locks. The bright orange color will help me identify my luggage quick and easy with my luggage being black
customer_reviews.author: antonio woods sr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, durable
customer_reviews.text: Locks arrived in a timely manner as promised. Easy to use with or without instruction and small enough and strong enough to withstand multiple check-in/security locations across the U.S. and Europe. The lock is good sizing to fit through your zipper holes and locks with ease for little fuss. Our locks were orange and, while small in size, another added identifier for our suitcases to stand out amongst others in baggage claim. These locks are sturdy yet somewhat flexible so you won't have to worry about them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M.

customer_reviews.title: Look cool but don't work
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with a key on one of the locks. Got an automated msg wanting my order i.d. so they could send a replacement and never heard another word from anyone. Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Twizted

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: i like that this provided an added level of protection to our luggage. TSA approved so I knew that they would be able to get into it without wasting much of their time. Peace of mind was priceless. They were easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: ashh2205

customer_reviews.title: They appear sturdy and should be safe as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Appears to work as advertised; however, I haven't been able to use them for travel yet. They open, close, and lock as they are supposed to do. They appear sturdy and should be safe as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good and does the job! I have this on a tool bag at work and it works great! Sure someone could cut it easily if they really wanted to but that kinda applies with all locks, all I can say is it keeps honest people honest. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Aincrad Reborn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and went through TSA
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. I used them on a trip overseas and they worked on luggage, backpacks, wallets etc. I wanted them just in case of pickpocketing. They were easy to use and went through TSA with no problems. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Good locks that aren't as small as I'd hoped
customer_reviews.text: I am quite satisfied with the locks. The seem sturdy and are not totally conspicuous. The only drawback I have with them is that I was hoping that I could use them with zippers. However if the zipper doesn't have a pull the hole for the pull is too small to allow the lock to go fit.
customer_reviews.author: Phennario

customer_reviews.title: Great for thicker lock locations.
customer_reviews.text: These locks are perfect for thicker lock locations on gun cases and other Pelican-type plastic hard cases that the normal small TSA padlocks won’t fit. The info says they will span 1-1/8” but mine will span 1-1/4”. They are all keyed alike and all work great. I would not expect them to protect a case full of gold bars but all I need them to do is keep the case locked/closed and appease the TSA agent who inspects it. Time will tell on how they hold up to the luggage gorillas at the airport. I bet they will be just fine.
customer_reviews.author: hilltop180

customer_reviews.title: Perfect security lock tamper seal!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these locks for my luggage. I also use them for my lunch bag for added security. Great all around lock for through zipper tab used to unzip luggage or lunch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Anders

customer_reviews.title: Small and Neat
customer_reviews.text: These Luggage locks are just the right thing to have for traveling no more numbers to remember just have to remember not to lose the keys . I order a black one and a orange one they blend right in with my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Guagliano

customer_reviews.title: solid construction!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to secure checked and carry-on luggage for an upcoming trip. My first impression upon receiving them is that they are solidly constructed and easy to use. I like that the four locks in the set are keyed alike which means we can use all four locks while carrying a minimum number of keys. The cables do pass through the zippers on our luggage (Delsey Chatillion series & PacSafe packs). Based on my first impression, I expect that these will hold-up as well as the luggage itself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Howe

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: was defeated by a 15 year old with a fork tine
customer_reviews.author: SE. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and did the job,
customer_reviews.text: These were very handy to have. Great locks and they look better than the typical TSA locks. Used them to lock up a drone case and then to lock that case in a duffle bag. Worked great and nice that I had a bunch of spare keys for the locks.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect functionality without added bulk
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and will be a nice piece of mind when I go on my trip. I love the fact there is no loop to catch on any and its functional without being bulky. The key is small enough to fit in my wallet with the ID I have to carry anyway, so no extra hassel.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly for what I need it. I need to secure my shoulder bag while traveling this coming May, since I will carry my laptop. The lock seems to be sturdy enough for that purpose. I think that is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: EVCA

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile. Do your homework
customer_reviews.text: They work really well on luggage, gym bags and back pack. It keeps the honest, honest. All the locks, from 2 orders are the same key. So I kept 3.1 for me, 2nd in a outlet and 1 to a trusted one. The other 15 I dropped in a brick cylinder wall. 8 feet tall.
customer_reviews.author: Paul that's me 😂💀

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues, works great and its sturdy, you dont have to worry about falling apart, it will definitely keep your items secured in your backpack when traveling........
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to see
customer_reviews.text: Got these just prior to an overseas trip. Was able to attach the item to the zippers on my bag. Was secure and easy to see on the pickup carousel.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These small locks are great if you don’t want to worry about those irritating tsa combination locks! Only think I don’t like is that they are a bit heavier than I thought. I bought them for either my military duffle bag or my backpack. The lock is too small for the duffle to be secure and it’s too big for to secure the backpack...other than that, they are pretty neat!!
customer_reviews.author: Rakel

customer_reviews.title: Highly secure!
customer_reviews.text: This was great because I'm not really to convinced with the locks that come with the suit cases. You can really feel the weight on these locks. A bit tricky to open at first but they definitely served their purpose and I felt secure with them on.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some luggage locks to lock up the different pockets of my Swiss Gear tool backpack. These locks did just the trick and look pretty nice too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Forschen

customer_reviews.title: Luggage Locks
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking a while for a lock to go thru my zipper tag on my luggage without a combination to it and I'm very please with these locks they fit very well and very please with them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my ebag. They work.
customer_reviews.text: These won't stop someone with a determination to get into your bag, but on the fly it will keep people honest. Love these locks.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Gigadee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & Quick to Remove
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quickly able to remove if need be. Very sturdy and reliable. Comes with plenty of extra keys that fit all the same locks if you want to have some all around or for multiple people.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it is not designed like other locks that might get caught in the conveyor system at the airport. The locks are amazing! Even better: the customer service. I was emailed several times to ensure that I was satisfied with my purchase and to answer any questions I might have. I am very happy with both the product and the customer interaction. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justun Borror

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: They worked great at the airport, kept our bags safe and they are small enough to not interfere when carrying your bags.
customer_reviews.author: Roadstercat

customer_reviews.title: Great lock
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. I used it to lock my toolbox while on a cruise, so locked and unlocked many times. Still works great. I likes th fkexible shaft. It made fitting it through the double lock on my toolbox very easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Barbour

customer_reviews.title: Needs two hands
customer_reviews.text: Cool and solid looking. After a few weeks of international travel I found it difficult to insert the flexible cable, key twist, and hold with aging fingers. One must use two hands to lock whereas a padlock design I can one hand clasp. DS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and product
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these. Using them for a rifle hard case which, being thick, would need a long lock to fit. These worked perfectly. Easy to use and having them all keyed the same is convenient and affordable compared to padlocks.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bosma

customer_reviews.title: At first, it was a little awkward handling. ...
customer_reviews.text: At first, it was a little awkward handling. I finally did attach to my zipper as explained but I was skeptical that it wouldn’t handle the luggage handling battering that takes place while travelling. I was surprised to see my suitcase coming down the luggage carousel with my bright orange locks still intact. Although the product performed, I am not convinced to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Paji

customer_reviews.title: I love that each lock comes with two keys
customer_reviews.text: Sexy design! I love that each lock comes with two keys. What I love even more is that one key opens all four locks in the pack! Makes traveling with four suitcases easy. This is much better than fiddling with those combination locks.
customer_reviews.author: Ksaj

customer_reviews.title: LOCK YOUR LUGGAGE WITH STYLE
customer_reviews.text: These locks are fantastic! I was drawn to the sleek and simplistic design. The orange color helped me identify my case quickly on the luggage cart.
customer_reviews.author: SaladEatingCat

customer_reviews.title: Unique locks
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy these. Locks are. Also, people are always intrigued when they see them. Will buy more
customer_reviews.author: GiGi K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice!
customer_reviews.text: Item was as described. All four locks were keyed alike. The key code is for TSA use only. I have a previous set and the keys are cut different, but the TSA key code is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This lock was very easy to install on the luggage I plan to use on my overnite trip. Who would think that someone would Remove my luggage from the overhead bin while I was sleeping. It happened but not to me. This lock gives me peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: August heat

customer_reviews.title: Like it so very much.
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely happy with this product. it is discreet and easy to use. Thank you!! Happy costumer
customer_reviews.author: enriqueta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Use for gun cases when traveling. Worked great and all keys matched when I bought multiple packs
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a variety of places. From locking the zippers on my motorcycle travel bags to locking trailer hitch latches. Planning to purchase several more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pastor Erstrom

customer_reviews.title: Great Lock For All Luggage
customer_reviews.text: These locks are a great alternative to the standard lock. Plus they are very strong and very easy to use. Great product and of course it arrived early just as most stuff does coming thru Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: E. Borden

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and off your bags.
customer_reviews.text: I do not travel a lot, and because I was having to check bags and take medicine that has strict laws surrounding it, I did not want anyone to have access to it other than myself. These locks were absolutely no hassle at all. Amazingly easy to use and would recommend to everyone looking for bag locks that will be easy for you, as the owner, to get into but hard for anyone else to gain access to your belongings.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of locks
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something very compact, particularly for all the zipper pockets of my ebags computer backpack, and these do the job really nicely. I've been happy with them over a few months' use now.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Adams

customer_reviews.title: locks work great
customer_reviews.text: I like the bright orange color and the shape of the lock. I use them for my backpack and luggage. They work great!! I ordered 4 of them and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Peter P.

customer_reviews.title: work great
customer_reviews.text: used for luggage and on my backpack while traveling. ez to use, fit both zipper types.
customer_reviews.author: Home

customer_reviews.title: Great locks
customer_reviews.text: These were awesome. Cool little locks and made my luggage easy to spot. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This will be my first time flying and i wanted something secure. These are perfect and shipped fast. love it.
customer_reviews.author: camobrownfrog

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Can he used for a locker as well. So small and light and easy to pack and take off quickly
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Wittig

customer_reviews.title: Slightly different lock configuration
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that one key worked for all 4 locks. They are orange and look different so it sets my luggage apart from all the other suitcases. They are easy to install and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Bert G. Penhollow

customer_reviews.title: Great for duffles
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping zippered knapsacks and duffels locked. Not always clear you have captured the cable when locking.
customer_reviews.author: zippykippy

customer_reviews.title: Did not received package.
customer_reviews.text: Item was tossed over gate but the gate has a gap underneath that the item can be easily pulled under. I received the other 2 packages from the day but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: dinnercoffee

customer_reviews.title: Suitcase locks
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Easy to open with the keys. Never got hassled by tsa. Everything works correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Received this just in time for my international flight. Tried it out. I had to do it a few times to get it. Small and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Penn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Any of these TSA approved luggage locks can be cut or picked within seconds if someone wants but these are meant to prevent crimes of opportunity and inside jobs. That being said, this is the best luggage lock I've ever used and probably the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: K. Alec

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the locks and they appear to work just fine. I tested multiple keys (8 keys for 4 locks) and they are keyed the same. As of now they open and lock and open and lock. I haven't traveled with them as of yet, but will soon be testing them out with our next flight.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these locks. I fly every couple of weeks, so I'll eventually see how they handle frequent use and abuse by the TSA.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy!!
customer_reviews.text: Used on my luggage during an overseas flight. Worked great. No fuss, easy on easy off. Talked two family members into ordering after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: itspaulas

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to use, and you don't have to remember codes or combinations....I love them and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: patricia g

customer_reviews.title: luggage locks
customer_reviews.text: Have not gone on my trip yet but these locks look well built and should do the trick. I got orange in the hope that it will make claiming my luggage a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice little lock that doesn't take up much space
customer_reviews.text: A nice little lock that doesn't take up much space. I use it on the case for my firearm. The two locks I received do have the same key, but I haven't seen anyone else with locks like these so I am not worried. Got the bright orange so they could easily be seen if dropped or lost.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Love that it has 2 keys in case he loses ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my sons luggage for a trip. Love that it has 2 keys in case he loses one. I like that the stem is flexible, I will be buying more for our luggage as well.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT LIL LOCKS
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT, JUST WHAT I NEEDED, AND GREAT TO LOCK YOUR LUGGAGE WHEN LEFT IN YOUR HOTEL ROOM UNATTENDED.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Not  bad
customer_reviews.text: The locks are OK. They stick sometimes and can be tricky to get unlocked. After several uses they see to be getting better.
customer_reviews.author: PowerHour

customer_reviews.title: Not flexable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered more after using them on trips. Seem to be Well made. Be aware that they are not flexable, so check your application first. One concern, the key from the first batch fit this set. If one key opens them all then not that secure.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carlson

product_meta.title: 4 Pack TSA Approved Luggage Locks with Keys for Travel – Flexible Ultra Secure Mini Key Padlock & Metal Zinc Alloy Material – Orange
feature_bullets: UNIQUE NEW DESIGN TSA APPROVED LOCK: This one of a kind straight barrel luggage lock with keys is a sturdy, sleek and well-designed TSA lock. The straight cable stem and lock barrel provide a unique appearance. Our travel lock is 100% Travel Sentry complaint, which allows airport security to unlock inspect and re-lock bags without cutting or damaging the lock.
ALL LOCKS IN PACKAGE ARE KEYED ALIKE: Every tsa recognized lock in the package will work with every key included.
DURABLE, DEPENDABLE & BEST QUALITY: Our TSA accepted certified luggage locks were designed with durability in mind and are made from a high strength Zinc Alloy to provide a lifetime of security.

EASY TO USE & MULTIPLE USES: Our uniquely designed TSA friendly key lock comes with a detachable wire stem. This stem easily slips through zipper pulls, duffle bags, purse latches, computer bags, backpacks, suitcases, briefcases and most carry-on items. This small lock is designed for smaller applications. It Includes two keys, you can use it just like any other traditional zipper lock.
LIFETIME WARRANTY: Each lightweight lock comes with a 100%, no questions asked money back guarantee. Instructions come with every luggage padlock purchase.
